messages.subject: finding the balance
messages.msgSnippet: Am I being neglectful to utilize this to read etc. to ds? We have no limits on the tv, but while I am delighted to be reading etc. with ds, it feels funny to
messages.messageBody:
"Am I being neglectful
to utilize this to read etc. to ds? We have no limits on the tv, but while I am

delighted to be reading etc. with ds, it feels funny to use tv for dd.We
didn't have much tv when ds was little.Any thoughts, opinions?"

ENJOY!!! WHat a fabulous solution to your challenge. I LOVE that Jalen enjoys tv and movies, it gives me time to focus on other things and he is content and entertained. AND, they're learning from it too...how cool. :)

Ren
